name: small bugfix release
input_bullets: Fixed crash when user deletes profile picture
Improved loading time for dashboard

name: security and ui
input_bullets: Patched XSS in comments section
Updated button colors on settings page

name: auth and password reset
input_bullets: Fixed bug where password reset emails were not sent
Improved login error messages

name: new feature plus fix
input_bullets: Added dark mode toggle in preferences
Fixed layout bug on mobile home screen

name: performance improvements
input_bullets: Optimized database queries for user list
Reduced memory usage in reporting module

name: notifications cleanup
input_bullets: Fixed duplicate push notifications on Android
Improved email notification formatting

name: api and docs
input_bullets: Added new /v2/users API endpoint
Updated API docs to include rate limits

name: search improvements
input_bullets: Improved relevance of search results
Fixed bug where filters were not applied correctly

name: billing and invoices
input_bullets: Fixed issue with pro plan invoices not generating
Added support for downloading invoice PDFs

name: accessibility tweaks
input_bullets: Improved keyboard navigation on settings page
Increased contrast of text in sidebar

name: onboarding improvements
input_bullets: Added progress indicator to onboarding wizard
Fixed typo in welcome email

name: data export
input_bullets: Added CSV export for user activity
Fixed encoding issues in existing export

name: multi language
input_bullets: Added Spanish translations for dashboard
Fixed missing translation keys in profile page

name: team management
input_bullets: Added ability to assign roles to team members
Fixed bug where removed users could still log in

name: analytics charts
input_bullets: Improved load time of analytics charts
Fixed incorrect label on revenue chart
